mapper.delete: delete from vote where bNo = #{bNo} AND mId = #{mId}
mapper.select: select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bNo = #{bNo} order by r.rNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.mId = #{b.mId} order by b.bNo DESC
select * from board where mId = 'admin' order by bNo DESC
select * from(select * from(select * from Board order by bVote desc) where rownum <=10) b left join breply r on b.bNo = r.bNo

select * from( select * from(select * from (select * from board where bDay = (select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') from dual)) order by bVote desc) where rownum <=10) b left join breply r on b.bNo = r.bNo
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bNick like '%'||#{bNick}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bTitle like '%'||#{bTitle}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bContent like '%'||#{bContent}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bTitle like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' OR b.bContent like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where r.rNo=#{rNo} order by r.rNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where r.rNick like '%'||#{rNick}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b left join BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bNo IN (select b.bNo from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where r.rMid like '%'||#{r.rMid}||'%' ) order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where r.rContent like '%'||#{rContent}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where r.rNick like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' OR r.rContent like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC

select * from Board b LEFT JOIN BReply r on b.bNo = r.bNo where b.bTitle like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' OR b.bContent like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' OR r.rNick like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' OR r.rContent like '%'||#{Keyword}||'%' order by b.bNo DESC
